name: '90s Football Stars
description:
An arcade football game with super fast, dynamic gameplay, retro attitude, and no holds barred matches.

Escaping the usual and boring clichés seen way too often in recent football games, ’90s Football Stars boldly recalls the glory days of the genre, bringing back memories of cult classics like Sensible World of Soccer and International Superstar Soccer. All set in inspiringly bonkers atmosphere and retro art style of the ’90s.
If you remember the legendary Dutch, Argentinean, and German teams from the not so distant past and such names as Gullit, Romário, and Valderama make you smile, this game is deﬁnitely for you and will give you a real thrill.Bring back those '90s feelings and dive deep into:
  • Fast and dynamic gameplay reminiscent of legendary ’90s football games
  • Retro art style with VHS ﬁlter designed to give that classic ’90s feel
  • All the teams qualiﬁed to World Cup 2018 available recreated in retro style with additional 50+ teams to be added later on
  • Legendary players used as reference: original ’90s kits, haircuts and accessories. Give that hockey hair a second chance!
  • Humor – football managers and simulators are boring. Let’s bring back fun to football!
  • The original soundtrack bringing back the sound of the ’90s
